text: A bailiwick () is the area where a bailiff is in charge. It used to also mean territories where an appointed bailiff did what a sheriff usually does. The bailiff did that under a royal or imperial writ. ==List of Bailiwicks== * Bailiwick of Guernsey * Bailiwick of Jersey * Bailiwick of Brandenburg * Bailiwick of Franconia * Bailiwick of Koblenz * Bailiwick of Stade * Bailiwick of Utrecht ==References== Category:Forms of government
title: Bailiwick
